text: Jan Keja (23 April 1937 â€“ 24 December 2024) was a Dutch television director. He worked for among others AVRO, KRO, NCRV, NOS, and TROS. He directed among others well known television programms for children, including Sesamstraat, Het Sinterklaasjournaal and Het Klokhuis. He won, as the first Dutch person, an Emmy Award in 1978. Keja died in Amsterdam on 24 December 2024, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:Television directors Category:Movie directors Category:Dutch people Category:1937 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Amsterdam
title: Jan Keja
